name: It's a match!!
description:
Game Description


It's a match!! is a captivating puzzle card game that immerses you in a world of romance and intrigue, all accessible through a virtual mobile phone app interface. Meet a cast of beautiful anime girls, each with her own personality and interests. Your choices and puzzle-solving skills will determine the depth of your relationships.

Key Features


Engaging Puzzle Mechanics
  • Solve relaxing card puzzles to unlock new images.
  • Use strategy and wit to win the hearts of the characters.
Diverse Cast of Characters
  • Meet a variety of beautiful anime girls, each with her own unique interests, backstory, and aesthetic.
  • Discover their likes and dislikes, and use this knowledge to deepen your connections.
Player Agency
  • Your choices matter. Make decisions that shape your relationships and determine the outcome of each interaction.
Additional Features
  • Stunning artwork and character design.

Final Thoughts


It's a match!! offers a unique blend of puzzle-solving and relationship-building, all wrapped up in a visually stunning anime aesthetic. Whether you're a fan of puzzle games, romance, or anime, It's a match!! has something to offer you. Are you ready to embark on a journey of love and puzzles?
